sentences.en: ‘I have it!’ Rosa exclaimed.
sentences.cn: “我有办法啦！”罗莎大声说。

sentences.en: ‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.cn: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.en: Don't worry. We'll have you out of here double-quick.
sentences.cn: 别担心，我们会很快把你从这儿弄出去的。

sentences.en: Dozens of miles of railway track have been torn up.
sentences.cn: 好几十英里的铁轨被毁坏了。

sentences.en: Dr. Johnson and I have been trying to build him up physically.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊医生和我一直试图增强他的体质。

sentences.en: everyone thinks he has it in him to produce a literary classic.
sentences.cn: 大家都认为他有创作经典文学作品的潜力。

sentences.en: had on red shoes.
sentences.cn: 穿红色鞋子

sentences.en: Has anyone phoned?
sentences.cn: 有人打过电话来吗？

sentences.en: He didn’t even have the courtesy to answer my letter.
sentences.cn: 他连给我回封信的礼貌都没有。

sentences.en: I am not worried—they've got nothing on me.
sentences.cn: 我不担心，他们抓不住我的把柄。

sentences.en: I am not worried—they've got nothing on me.
sentences.cn: 我不担心，他们抓不住我的把柄。

sentences.en: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
sentences.cn: 我已经15年没见他了。

sentences.en: I have $100m hidden away where no one will ever find it.
sentences.cn: 我把1亿美元藏到了一个永远没人会找到的地方。

sentences.en: I have a fair idea of how difficult things can be.
sentences.cn: 我大致了解情况会有多困难。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I'll report back the moment I have located him.
sentences.cn: 我一找到他就马上汇报。

sentences.en: I've had it with him—he's humiliated me once too often!.
sentences.cn: 我对他已忍无可忍——他羞辱得我够多的了。

sentences.en: Our guests have arrived.
sentences.cn: 我们的客人到了。

sentences.en: Remember, happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely upon what you think.--Dale Carnegie
sentences.cn: 请记住，幸福不在于你是谁或者你拥有什么，而仅仅取决于你的心态！

sentences.en: rumour had it that although he lived in a derelict house, he was really very wealthy.
sentences.cn: 传言说虽然他住在破败的房子里，他其实很有钱。

sentences.en: She has dark hair and brown eyes.
sentences.cn: 她一头黑发，眼睛是棕色的。

sentences.en: She sat down and had another drink.
sentences.cn: 她坐下来又喝了一杯。

sentences.en: Sometimes things have to fall apart to make way for better things.
sentences.cn: 有时候要到达谷底，才会慢慢变好。

sentences.en: Sullivan’s music does have a certain charm.
sentences.cn: 沙利文的音乐确实具有某种魅力。

sentences.en: the ayes have it.
sentences.cn: 对决议投赞成票者占多数。

sentences.en: the car had had it.
sentences.cn: 这辆汽车没用了。

sentences.en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentences.cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentences.en: They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.cn: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.en: Things might have been different if I'd talked a bit more.
sentences.cn: 如果当时我再多说一点的话，结果或许会不一样。

sentences.en: We have a dinner party on for tomorrow evening.
sentences.cn: 明天晚上我们打算参加晚宴

sentences.en: We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.cn: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.en: Wild rice has a very nutty flavour.
sentences.cn: 菰米有很浓的坚果风味。

sentences.en: You have to do everything you can. You have to work your hardest. And if you do, if you stay positive, then you have a shot at a silver lining.
sentences.cn: 你必须全力以赴，最大限度地去努力。如果你这么做，并且保持乐观，你就会看见乌云背后的幸福线。

sentences.en: You have to pay your outstanding bill before joining the scheme.
sentences.cn: 在参加该项目之前必须结清余账。

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

sentences.en: You haven’t done much, have you?
sentences.cn: 你没做多少，是吗？

sentences.en: You must have noticed how tired he sometimes looks.
sentences.cn: 你一定注意到他有时候显得特别疲惫。

sentences.en: You need to have a lot of patience to be a teacher.
sentences.cn: 当老师必须具备相当的耐心。

phrases.phrase: have a care (或 an eye 等)

phrases.tran_cn: (主美)［道别时用于表示良好的祝愿］祝你愉快
(非正式)因感情（尤指爱情）问题深受煎熬

phrases.phrase: have got it in one to do something
have got nothing on informal 非正式
phrases.tran_cn: 没有（或有）（某人）的把柄；不知道（或知道）某人做过不名誉的事（或违法的事）

phrases.phrase: have had it informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: [口]一决雌雄；（同某人）讲个明白
摊牌；决雌雄于；同某人讲明白；与某人较量
策划：被安排在计划之内
只得怪自己，活该；自作自受，咎由自取
讨论或争论得出结论，邀请出去
称职；具备取得成功的必要条件

trans.tran_cn: 用以构成完成式及完成式的不定式，表示已经…
trans.tran_en: used with past participles to form perfect tenses

trans.tran_cn: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
trans.tran_en: used with past participles to form perfect tenses

trans.tran_cn: 〈口〉有产者，有钱人，富国，〈英俚〉欺骗，诈骗

trans.tran_en: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say what someone or something looks like, what qualities or features they possess etc

trans.tran_cn: 有，具有，拿，取得，从事，必须，不得不
trans.tran_en: used to say what someone or something looks like, what qualities or features they possess etc
